description: Ms. Katahira is the math teacher at Fujimi High, known for being strict on students not following the rules and regulations. She tore apart http://anidb.net/ch89598 [Tsukamoto]`s copy of I`m Going to Save This World! and attempted to report the stray cats gathering near school that http://anidb.net/ch89596 [Gotou] was feeding. Fortunately or not, her call was interrupted by http://anidb.net/ch89605 [Ozaki].
name: Katahira-sensei
